memberdef.name: LV_GAUGE_INTERPOLATE_SHIFT
memberdef.initializer: 5 /*Interpolate the needle drawing between to degrees*/

detaileddescription.para:
Handle the drawing related tasks of the gauges
gauge
pointer to an object
mask
the object will be drawn only in this area
mode
LV_DESIGN_COVER_CHK: only check if the object fully covers the 'mask_p' area (return 'true' if yes) LV_DESIGN_DRAW: draw the object (always return 'true') LV_DESIGN_DRAW_POST: drawing after every children are drawn
return
true/false, depends on 'mode'

Signal function of the gauge
gauge
pointer to a gauge object
sign
a signal type from lv_signal_t enum
param
pointer to a signal specific variable
LV_RES_OK: the object is not deleted in the function; LV_RES_INV: the object is deleted

Draw the scale on a gauge
gauge
pointer to gauge object
mask
mask of drawing

Draw the needles of a gauge
gauge
pointer to gauge object
mask
mask of drawing

Create a gauge objects
par
pointer to an object, it will be the parent of the new gauge
copy
pointer to a gauge object, if not NULL then the new object will be copied from it
pointer to the created gauge

Set the number of needles
gauge
pointer to gauge object
needle_cnt
new count of needles
colors
an array of colors for needles (with 'num' elements)

Set the value of a needle
gauge
pointer to a gauge
needle_id
the id of the needle
value
the new value

memberdef.argsstring: (lv_obj_t *gauge, uint16_t angle, uint8_t line_cnt, uint8_t label_cnt)
memberdef.name: lv_gauge_set_scale

detaileddescription.para:
Set the scale settings of a gauge
gauge
pointer to a gauge object
angle
angle of the scale (0..360)
line_cnt
count of scale lines. The get a given "subdivision" lines between label, line_cnt = (sub_div + 1) * (label_cnt - 1) + 1
label_cnt
count of scale labels.

Get the value of a needle
gauge
pointer to gauge object
needle
the id of the needle
the value of the needle [min,max]

Get the count of needles on a gauge
gauge
pointer to gauge
count of needles

Set the number of labels (and the thicker lines too)
gauge
pointer to a gauge object
count of labels
